title: Rye On A Roll: US Developer Greenlit For Massive Pumped Hydro Energy Storage Project On Brownfield
description:
The proposed Goldendale Energy Storage Project in Washington State is one step closer to adding 1.2 gigawatts of pumped hydropower storage to the nation's renewable energy profile.

The post Rye On A Roll: US Developer Greenlit For Massive Pumped Hydro Energy Storage Project On Brownfield appeared first on CleanTechnica.
